::Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm/Hot Rod::

Not expecting the sudden movement, Rixer takes the kick square in the
jaw, and hits the ground.
"Yikes, what force!"

Cleder, Blyer, Firearm, and Forrior who had just rejoined the fight
aimed at McGowan's head. Once again each fireing two shots.(8 again)
They hope that the head will be a weak spot.

Hot Rod saw the sword coming, and grabed the wrist of that arm. Now Depp
and Hot Rod had a hold on each others arms. Hot Rod sent a good thrust
kick at Depp's stomach.(I dont think there would be much room to
counter, if they are close enough to have hold of each other)
